name: Neverout
description: Neverout is a unique puzzle game with innovative mechanics and immersive, unsettling atmosphere. The game puts the player in a small, claustrophobic cube, that has only one way out. Will you survive?Now Playable on any PC, no headset required!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 or newer Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD FX4350 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: For VR-mode minimal graphic card required: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater Storage: 2 GB available space
